narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Wicomico County Health Department is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Salisbury, MD. From 2018-01 through 2020-11, this provider received $201K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 822 beneficiaries, billing 3 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 3.4× the national median for H0020 (H0020), at $64 per claim vs. the median of $19. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
94% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: H0020 (H0020). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Saw a 3.9× spike in 2020 ($2K → $7K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
Billing stopped in 2020-11, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.

narrative.title: Important Context
items: This is a government entity that may serve as a fiscal agent for large populations. Government providers often bill at high volumes due to the scale of public programs they administer.
